description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Monuments religieux, militaires et civils des Deux-Sèvres ... Seconde édition. Avec une notice biographique sur Ch. Arnauld, A. Baugier et E. Conte, un précis de l'histoire du Départment et de la Ville de Niort, par L. Favre. [With plates.]" Author: ARNAULD, Charles. Contributor: BAUGIER, Antoine. Contributor: CONTE, Édouard Guillaume. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10174.d.7." Page: 12 Place of Publishing: Niort Date of Publishing: 1876 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000117698 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
